title: Mastery bug
body:
I was creating a new Mastery page for my tanks when I got a message say


Error
An Unexpected error has occurred. 

Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forums for more information.

Has anyone else got this?

replies.body: If you're still having issues with changing masteries, please try [**repairing your client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article) and let me know if that fixes the problem!
